updated_cases.title: Verify the Transaction Event with IPSEC/GRE + SAML + Cookie surrogate
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the Transaction Event with IPSEC/GRE + SAML + Cookie surrogate
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Restart mtnsproxy  ( to have empty user table)
2. Enable log levels tcp trans_event 1 user 3 httpmod httpreq 4 httpauth 5 
3. Generate traffic ( please use a simple GET if possible so we can search the log consistently)
4. (optional) authentication steps
5. Collect transaction events
6. Compared with expected results
7. Collect the log (please separate log for every access method )
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Please confirm if there is any log containing ISSUE DETECTED
Eg: ISSUE DETECTED: Mismatched authentication

updated_cases.title: Verify the Transaction Event with x-cs-connect-xau field
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify the Transaction Event with x-cs-connect-xau field
updated_cases.custom_steps:
1. Restart mtnsproxy  ( to have empty user table)
2. Enable log levels tcp trans_event 1 user 3 httpmod httpreq 4 httpauth 5 
3. Generate traffic ( please use a simple GET if possible so we can search the log consistently)
4. curl -X CONNECT -H "XAU: your_custom_value" http://example.com:8080
5. Collect transaction events
6. Compared with expected results
7. Collect the log (please separate log for every access method )
updated_cases.custom_expected:
Please confirm if there is any log containing ISSUE DETECTED
Eg: ISSUE DETECTED: Mismatched authentication
